title: Paparazzi
lyrics:
[intro] (Bm) x 4
(Bm)We are the crowd, we're (Bm)c-comin' out
Got my (Bm)flash on, it's true
Need that (Bm)picture of you, it's so (G)magical
(G)We'd be so fan(Bm)tastical  (Bm)
(Bm)Leather and jeans, ga(Bm)rage glamorous
Not (Bm)sure what it means
But this (Bm)photo of us, it don't (G)have a price
(G)Ready for those (Em)flashing lights
'Cause you (Em-stop)know that, baby, I
[chorus]
(G)I'm your biggest fan, I'll (D)follow you until you (Em)love me
Papa-(C)paparazzi
(G)Baby, there's no other (D)superstar, you know that (Em)I'll be
Your papa-(C)paparazzi
(G)Promise I'll be (D)kind
But I won't stop un(Em)til that boy is (Bm)mine
(G)Baby, you'll be famous, (D)chase you down until you (Em)love me
Papa-(C)paparazzi
[interlude] (Bm) x 4
(Bm)I'll be your girl, back(Bm)stage at your show
Velvet (Bm)ropes and guitars
Yeah, 'cause (Bm)you're my rockstar in be(G)tween the sets
(G)Eyeliner and (Bm)cigarettes  (Bm)
 
(Bm)Shadow is burnt, yellow, (Bm)dance and we turn
My (Bm)lashes are dry
Purple (Bm)teardrops I cry, it don't (G)have a price
(G)Loving you is (Em)cherry pie
'Cause you (Em-stop)know that, baby, I
 
[chorus]
(G)I'm your biggest fan, I'll (D)follow you until you (Em)love me
Papa-(C)paparazzi
(G)Baby, there's no other (D)superstar, you know that (Em)I'll be
Your papa-(C)paparazzi
(G)Promise I'll be (D)kind
But I won't stop un(Em)til that boy is (Bm)mine
(G)Baby, you'll be famous, (D)chase you down until you (Em)love me
Papa-(C)paparazzi
[bridge]
(Bm)Reeeal good, we dance (Bm) in the studio
(Bm)Snaaap, snap to that shit (Bm) on the radio
(Bm) Don't stop (Bm)for anyone
(Bm) We're plastic, but we (Em)still… have… fun!
[chorus]
(G)I'm your biggest fan, I'll (D)follow you until you (Em)love me
Papa-(C)paparazzi
(G)Baby, there's no other (D)superstar, you know that (Em)I'll be
Your papa-(C)paparazzi
(G)Promise I'll be (D)kind
But I won't stop un(Em)til that boy is (Bm)mine
(G)Baby, you'll be famous, (D)chase you down until you (Em)love me
Papa-(C)paparazzi (slow and let ring) [end]
